attributes.title: Disgusting 🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app is positively the worst thing I have ever seen in the my whole life it made my eyes gush blood 🩸 highly do not recommend my family was very worried for me and ask what was wrong than before I knew it all of our eyes were gushing blood so thanks to this app I am dead now and my family is to...

attributes.title: Horrible app

It’s so bad i got it to see and then my phone started to get messed up and I took my phone in and it said that it was bc of that all so don’t get the app!!! I will mess it up and it was always be slow and I have an iPhone so I don’t think it should move slow

attributes.title: Waste of space
attributes.review: I’ve tried to go on this in order to support our dear president but it’s only shown me stupid ads and it made me put in my personal information. It also caused all of my software to crash and brought a swarm of honeybees over to my house which ended up attacking my sister

attributes.title: Horrible so many ads!!!😡😡😡
attributes.review: It is terrible how many people think this app is bad and i’m one of those people this is just a campaign app basically no one download this set the worst rating this app is horrid and it also plays music that is very annoying and made my dogs freak out horrible app🤬😡

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app is literally so terrible I have no idea why it hasn’t been taken down. It took 3 days to download, kept glitching me out of the app and overall made my phone go 10x slower. I expected so much since this is an app that THE PRESIDENT markets, but i will sincerely never download it again not worth my space!!!!!!

attributes.title: terrible and awful app
attributes.review: this app is miss-informing you about everything, everything in this app is absolutely fake, the register to vote wouldn’t even work, most of the time nothing did. I wanted to help and support the big orange cheeto🍊but i can’t when everything in here is fake news

attributes.title: I Had To Get A New Phone
attributes.review: This app lagged my whole phone to the point that I couldn’t even open an app. I know it was this app because I did it to my old phone and the same thing happened. This app needs to be removed from the App Store. Someone please be aware this might happen. 1/5 Rating from me

attributes.title: Someone
attributes.review: Hate hate hateeeeeee the app,This app is absolutely terrible who will download this?? When you download the app it says if you don’t vote for Trump your bank account can be deleted and I had no-shows cause I don’t want to risk itAlso don’t forget the fact that Trump is racist and he’s a bad person are you guys should vote for Obama!!!!!!!!!!.

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: This app is almost impossible to function. The amount of lag and complications is astronomical. I can’t even fathom what the point on this app is. If this isn’t deleted off the App Store I might as well switch to the google play store which will hopefully have better apps than this garbage.

attributes.title: No hope
attributes.review: That app does not work it is to glitchy and it always gives you ads that you never use and if you do something wrong with you and and I don’t know why you guys are getting this app if you’re just gonna protest for him what’s wrong with you gen Z knows more than you.
